description.mekanismgenerators.advanced_: An advanced generator that directly absorbs the sun's rays with little loss to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.bio_gener: A generator that burns organic materials of the world to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.control_r: A collection of control rods used to halt a fission chain reaction. Placed on top of a tower of Fission Fuel Assemblies.
description.mekanismgenerators.electroma: A block that converts kinetic energy from a Rotational Complex into usable electricity. These can be placed in any arrangement above your Rotational Complex, as long as they are all touching each other and the complex itself.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_f: A cluster of fuel rods used to house fission fuel within a Fission Reactor. These can be stacked on top of each other.
description.mekanismgenerators.fission_r: Lead-infused steel casing used to create a Fission Reactor. Mostly heat-resistant, mostly radiation-resistant, and mostly safe!
A block that can be used to monitor or control the Fission Reactor with redstone.
A port which can be placed on a Fission Reactor multiblock to transfer coolant, fuel, and waste.
description.mekanismgenerators.fusion_re: The controlling block for the entire Fusion Reactor structure.
Reinforced framing that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
A block that can be used to allow basic monitoring of a reactor using redstone.
A block of reinforced framing that is capable of managing both the gas and energy transfer of the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.gas_burni: A generator that harnesses the varying molecular gases to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.geotherma: Harnesses geothermal energy from the surrounding environment, and improves protection against damage from heat sources. Install multiple for faster charging and greater protection.
description.mekanismgenerators.heat_gene: A generator that uses the heat of lava or other burnable resources to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.laser_foc: A panel of Fusion Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor.l: Activate the reactor when powered, and deactivate when unpowered
Output when the reactor's core heat capacity has been met
Output when the reactor reaches critical damage levels (100%+).
Output when the reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
Output when the reactor has excess waste
Output when the reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
Output when the reactor reaches dangerous temperatures
description.mekanismgenerators.reactor_g: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fission Reactor and Fusion Reactor multiblocks (as well as any others!).
description.mekanismgenerators.rotationa: A connector that is placed on the highest Turbine Rotor of an Industrial Turbine to carry kinetic energy into its Electromagnetic Coils.
description.mekanismgenerators.saturatin: A block that condenses steam processed by an Industrial Turbine into reusable water. These can be placed in any arrangement above your rotational complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_gen: A generator that uses the power of the sun to produce energy.
description.mekanismgenerators.solar_rec: Harnesses the power of the sun to charge your MekaSuit. Install multiple for faster charging.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_c: Pressure-resistant casing used in the creation of an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_r: The steel rod that is used to house Turbine Blades within an Industrial Turbine.
description.mekanismgenerators.turbine_v: A type of Turbine Casing that includes a port for the transfer of energy and steam.
A type of Turbine Casing with an integrated vent for the release of steam. These should be placed on the level of or above the turbine's Rotational Complex.
description.mekanismgenerators.wind_gene: A generator that uses the strength of the wind to produce energy, with greater efficiency at higher levels.
fission.mekanismgenerators.force_disable: Reactor must reach safe damage and temperature levels before it can be reactivated.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Couldn't form, improper placement for Control Rod Assembly at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_f: Couldn't form, missing fuel assembly for control rod at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_extra: Couldn't form, found extra Control Rod Assembly at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Couldn't form, invalid Fission Fuel Assembly placement at %1$s.
fission.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Couldn't form, no fuel assembly structures present.
fission.mekanismgenerators.missing_contr: Couldn't form, missing control rod for fuel assembly at %1$s.
Toggled Reactor Port eject mode to: %1$s.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_c: Couldn't form, found improperly placed Rotational Complex at %1$s. Complex must be centered above Turbine Rotors.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_bad_r: Couldn't form, found invalid Turbine Rotor at %1$s. Turbine Rotors must be centered below Rotational Complex.
Couldn't form, invalid Turbine Rotor arrangement.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_conde: Couldn't form, found improperly placed Saturating Condenser at %1$s. Saturating Condensers must be above Pressure Disperser layer.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_even_: Couldn't form, width and length of structure must be odd.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_malfo: Couldn't form, Electromagnetic Coil arrangement is malformed. Coils must be connected to Rotational Complex and adjacently connected.
Couldn't form, Pressure Disperser arrangement is malformed. Dispersers must create complete horizontal layer surrounding Rotational Complex.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_missi: Couldn't form, no Electromagnetic Coils present.
Couldn't form, no Rotational Complex present.
Couldn't form, expected but didn't find Pressure Disperser at %1$s.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_too_n: Couldn't form, structure is too narrow to support turbine size.
turbine.mekanismgenerators.invalid_vent_: Couldn't form, found a Turbine Vent below Pressure Disperser layer. Vents must be at or above vertical position of disperser layer.
